title: Build a School in the Cloud
description: Onstage at TED2013, Sugata Mitra makes his bold TED Prize wish: Help me design the School in the Cloud, a learning lab in India, where children can explore and learn from each other -- using resources and mentoring from the cloud. Hear his inspiring vision for Self Organized Learning Environments.
author: Sugata Mitra
keywords: TED, talks, TED Prize, technology, code, education
